name: Midas Queen
description:
She is looking for her children... But she can never touch them again.

Midas Queen is a Beat'em Up with Platform elements that tells the story of a strong woman who has the power to transform everything she touches in pure silver - a gift that it's also a terrible curse, as she might learn from her mistakes.

YOU CAN PRESS ENTER OR ESC ANYTIME DURING GAMEPLAY TO SEE THE BUTTONS CONFIGURATION. (KEYBOARD AND MOUSE OR JOYPAD)

This playable prototype was made in 4 days by Rafael Martins, as well as the music "Drone Attack" featured on the game. 

Assets from UE4 Marketplace: Infinity Blade: Fire Lands; MP Retro Gaming; Polygon City, Retro 8Bits Sounds; Ten Fantasy Weapon, VFX Toolkit V1 and Mixamo Character.
